subject: DoesJUnit support integration testing of multiple objects?
msgSnippet: I m assigned the task of using JUnit to test the Java implementation of Use Cases.  Typically, a Use Case is implemented across several objects, working
messageBody:
I'm assigned the task of using JUnit to test the Java implementation of Use
Cases. Typically, a Use Case is implemented across several objects, working
together to accomplish a task. This is one level out from unit testing one
object; this is testing the integration of more than one object.

Does JUnit facilitate and support the integration testing of multiple
components?

Thanks,
Bob
